text: Adeoye "Oye" Owolewa (born 1989) is a Nigerian-American Democratic politician and pharmacist who is the Shadow Member of the U.S. House of Representatives from the District of Columbia's at-large district since 2021. In November 2020, he was elected as the shadow representative of the United States House of Representatives from the District of Columbia. He is in charge of trying to get congress to support D.C. statehood. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Boston Category:Politicians from Washington, D.C.
title: Oye Owolewa
